instruction.en:
Press and hold the 1 key for three seconds to enter inclusion mode.

Make sure you have the Device Specific Key (DSK) at hand, the device will reset itself when not entered within 1 minute.
instruction.nl:
Hou de 1 knop drie seconden ingedrukt om de integratie mode te starten.

Zorg ervoor dat je de Device Specific Key (DSK) bij de hand hebt, het apparaat zal zich resetten als de Key niet binnen 1 minuut ingegeven wordt.

instruction.en: Press and hold the 1 key for three seconds to reset the device.
instruction.nl: Hou de 1 knop drie seconden ingedrukt om het apparaat te resetten.

hint.en:
Use the app-to-app integration with Heimdall. All you have to do is create your users in Heimdall and give them a Pincode. When a Pincode is entered on the keypad followed by an action key (like Arm or Disarm) the information is sent to Heimdall and Heimdall will do the rest. 

No need to setup flows!

Use spoken messages on your Ring Keypad when events occur. 

(This will not disable the sound of a countdown.) 

Default: Enabled.

Play a sound at the end of the countdown right before actually arming when using an delayed arming. 

Default: Enabled.

Ignore the warning send by Heimdall when there is a sensor active at arming. 

Default: Disabled.

label.en: Use this Ring Keypad as a

hint.en:
When enabled the Ring Keypad will be used as a Siren when Intergrate with Heimdall is enabled. 

No need to setup flows!

Timeout when a button is pressed, but a sequence is not completed and buttons are no longer being pressed. 

Default: 5 seconds.

Status Change Timeout. 
default: 15 seconds.

The volume of the sound when pressing a key. 

Default: 4

The volume of the Siren. 

Default: 5.

Fast Rate Type to blink the LEDs 

Default: 5.

Slow Rate Type to blink the LEDs. 

Default: 2.
When enabled the loss of AC mains power will trigger the tamper alarm. Only use this when using it wall mounted with a continous connection to your AC mains.

Set the languages to the keypad. 

Default: üá∫üá∏ US English.
Set the battery power saving mode for the keypad. You can adjust the LED brightness for both modes in the Extended Battery Life and Normal Battery Life settings.

Brightness for all LEDs in Extended Battery Life Power Mode. 

Default: 50%.

Brightness for all LEDs in Normal Battery Life Power Mode. 

Default: 65%.

Timeout for keypad LED backlight to stay on between key presses. 

Default: 3 seconds.

Adjusts the brightness of the keypad backlight. 

Default: 50%.

Light threshold where keypad will stop backlighting if higher than. 

Default: 50.

When used the LEDs will light up when you come close to the Keypad. 

Default: On.

Timeout when proximity is detected and no input is received. 

Default: 5 seconds.

Adjusts the proximity distance. 

Default: 100 cm.

The interval between battery reports. 

Default: 70 minutes.
hint.nl:
De tijdsduur tussen batterij rapporten. 

Standaard: 70 minuten.

hint.en:
The duration the keypad keeps listening for Z-wave commands after communication. 

Default: 1 second.
hint.nl:
De tijdsduur die het toetsenpaneel luisterd naar Z-wave commando's na communicatie. 

Standaard: 1 seconde.

instruction.en:
Press and hold the 1 key for three seconds to enter inclusion mode.

Make sure you have the Device Specific Key (DSK) at hand, the device will reset itself when not entered within 1 minute.

When adding the device:

Connect to power, press and hold the 1 key for 3 seconds to reset the device.
(It may be needed to manually reset the device prior using the pinhole button before starting this inclusion.)

Remove from Homey: Let this dialog timeout and reset the device using the pinhole button.

hint.en:
Use the app-to-app integration with Heimdall. All you have to do is create your users in Heimdall and give them a Pincode. When a Pincode is entered on the keypad followed by an action key (like Arm or Disarm) the information is sent to Heimdall and Heimdall will do the rest. 

No need to setup flows!

Ignore the warning send by Heimdall when there is a sensor active at arming. 

Default: Disabled.

label.en: Use this Ring Keypad as a

hint.en:
THIS FUNCTION IS NOT YET IMPLEMENTED


When enabled the Ring Keypad will be used as a Siren when Intergrate with Heimdall is enabled. 

No need to setup flows!

Timeout when a button is pressed, but a sequence is not completed and buttons are no longer being pressed. 

Default: 5 seconds.

Timeout when indicator command is received to change status. 
default: 15 seconds.

The audio volume of spoken messages. 

Default: 7.
hint.nl:
het geluidsvolume van gesproken berichten. 

Standaard: 7.

hint.en:
The volume of the sound when pressing a key. 

Default: 6.
hint.nl:
Het volume van het geluid als er op een toets gedrukt wordt. 

Standaard: 6.

hint.en:
The volume of the Siren. 

Default: 10.
hint.nl:
Het volume van de sirene. 

Standaard: 10.

hint.en:
Configures the duration in seconds for the hold time required to capture a long press. 
This includes Emergency Buttons + Mode Buttons (Police, Fire, Medical, Disarmed, Home, Away). 

Default: 3 seconds.
hint.nl:
het geluidsvolume van gesproken berichten. 

Standaard: 7.

hint.en:
Configures the duration in seconds for the hold time required to capture a long press. 
This includes Number Pad + Check & X (0-9, Check, X)
hint.nl:
het geluidsvolume van gesproken berichten. 

Standaard: 7.

hint.en:
Adjusts the brightness of the security mode buttons. 

Default: 100%.

Adjusts the brightness of the keypad backlight. Used for Key Backlight LEDs only. 

Default: 100%.

Light threshold where keypad will stop backlighting if higher than. 

Default: 5.

When enabled the loss of AC mains power will trigger the tamper alarm. Only use this when using it wall mounted with a continous connection to your AC mains. 

Default: On.

Set the languages to the keypad. 

Default: üá∫üá∏ US English.

When used the LEDs will light up when you come close to the Keypad. 

Default: On.

Timeout in seconds when proximity is detected and no input is received. 

Default: 5 seconds.

The interval between battery reports. 

Default: 70 minutes.
hint.nl:
De tijdsduur tussen batterij rapporten. 

Standaard: 70 minuten.

instruction.en:
Remove and replace the battery again and attach the cover to enter inclusion mode (2).

Make sure you have the Device Specific Key (DSK) at hand, the device will reset itself when not entered within 1 minute.
instruction.nl:
Haal de batterij er weer uit, plaats terug en monteer de kap om de integratie mode te starten (2).

Zorg ervoor dat je de Device Specific Key (DSK) bij de hand hebt, het apparaat zal zich resetten als de Key niet binnen 1 minuut ingegeven wordt.

instruction.en: Press the cover release to access the battery, remove and replace the battery to reset the device.
instruction.nl: Druk op de clip en verwijder de kap om de batterij er uit te halen en weer in te doen om de detector te resetten.

hint.en:
The interval between battery reports. 

Default: 4200 seconds (70 minuten).
hint.nl:
De tijdsduur tussen batterij rapporten. 

Standaard: 4200 seconds (70 minuten).

instruction.en:
Remove and replace the battery again and attach the cover to enter inclusion mode (2).

Make sure you have the Device Specific Key (DSK) at hand, the device will reset itself when not entered within 1 minute.
instruction.nl:
Haal de batterij er weer uit, plaats terug en monteer de kap om de integratie mode te starten (2).

Zorg ervoor dat je de Device Specific Key (DSK) bij de hand hebt, het apparaat zal zich resetten als de Key niet binnen 1 minuut ingegeven wordt.

instruction.en: Press the cover release to access the battery, remove and replace the battery to reset the device.
instruction.nl: Druk op de clip en verwijder de kap om de batterij er uit te halen en weer in te doen om de detector te resetten.

hint.en:
This setting will disable the motion alarm after the given time (in minutes) has expired. Every time motion is observed by the device it will reset this timeout.

Default: 3 minutes
hint.nl:
Deze instelling zal het bewegingsalarm uitschakelen na de tijd (in minuten) is verstreken. Elke keer dat opnieuw beweging wordt gedetecteerd wordt deze timer herstart.

Standaard: 3 minuten

hint.en:
Configures the ‚ÄúPet Immunity,‚Äù or sensitivity of the motion detection used mostly so only human motion is detected.

Default: 15kg (33lb)
hint.nl:
Configures the ‚ÄúPet Immunity,‚Äù or sensitivity of the motion detection used mostly so only human motion is detected.

Default: 15kg (33lb)

hint.en:
The interval between battery reports. 

Default: 4200 seconds (70 minuten).
hint.nl:
De tijdsduur tussen batterij rapporten. 

Standaard: 4200 seconds (70 minuten).
